EnhancedContent:
A **Microsoft 365 Collaboration Architect** plays a crucial role in designing, implementing, and managing collaboration solutions across Microsoft 365 services, including SharePoint, Teams, OneDrive, and Exchange. This role requires deep technical expertise, strategic planning skills, and a strong understanding of business needs.

If you’re looking to transition into this role, here’s a structured guide on the skills you need, recommended training, and a roadmap to becoming a **Microsoft 365 Collaboration Architect**.

[https://dellenny.com/how-to-become-a-microsoft-365-collaboration-architect/](https://dellenny.com/how-to-become-a-microsoft-365-collaboration-architect/)
Author: JohnNaguib
Title: How to Become a Microsoft 365 Collaboration Architect
Description:
A **Microsoft 365 Collaboration Architect** plays a crucial role in designing, implementing, and managing collaboration solutions across Microsoft 365 services, including SharePoint, Teams, OneDrive, and Exchange. This role requires deep technical expertise, strategic planning skills, and a strong understanding of business needs.

If you’re looking to transition into this role, here’s a structured guide on the skills you need, recommended training, and a roadmap to becoming a **Microsoft 365 Collaboration Architect**.

[https://dellenny.com/how-to-become-a-microsoft-365-collaboration-architect/](https://dellenny.com/how-to-become-a-microsoft-365-collaboration-architect/)
